name: Dan Siewiorek
content: Daniel P. Siewiorek Daniel P. Siewiorek Quality of Life Technology Center Human-Computer Interaction Institute Buhl University Professor of Electrical and Computer Engineering and Computer Science dps@cs.cmu.edu Mailing Address: Human-Computer Interaction Institute Carnegie Mellon University Newell-Simon Hall 3513 5000 Forbes Avenue Pittsburgh, PA 15213-3890 USA Phone: 412.268.2570 (Voice) 412.268.5807 (Fax) Secretary: Marian D'Amico Newell-Simon Hall 3507 412.268.1215 (Voice) 412.268.5807 (Fax) marian@cs.cmu.edu Research Interests: Wearable Computing Context-Aware Computing Fault-tolerant Computing Reliable Computing Computer-aided Design Computer Architecture Design Automation Rapid Protyping Current Teaching: 15-821 / 18-843: Mobile Computing Systems and Applications (Fall) 05-540 / 05-872 / 15-540 /18-540 / 39-648: Rapid Prototyping of Computer Systems (Spring) Current Graduate Students: Scott Fisk Brian French Kevin Huang John Kelly dps@cs.cmu.edu, last updated 24 Feb 2017.
